website_summaries.verdict: Men who can't get straps from smaller sets around their ankles should consider this pair.
pros: Soft and comfortable on the leg
Attach securely, stay in place on the leg
Comes in a variety of weight choices
Adjustable hook-and-loop bands easily adjust to ankle size
cons: Soft fabric makes these comfortable, but prone to snagging on the hook-and-loop closures

customer_reviews.title: loved them, then they let me down, and spilled black sand all over my house.  darn you da vinci weights....
customer_reviews.text: unbelievable comfortable, soft, work great... just a few months in began breaking down, spilling black innards... stitching coming out. Bought several. Went from a 5 star to a 1. Will give a 3. Light limited use would still buy. Otherwise not. Bought several, same with all! Sad. :( Update, all sets of them have opened up after minimal use and spill all over. horrible quality. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Kumprey

customer_reviews.title: Great product (but
customer_reviews.text: Great product (but....) - most convenient to wear due to the soft shell. Unfortunately, the soft material wears off by the contact with the velcro closure. Mine got holes after 4 mos of moderate use as ankle weights. It was good while it lasted....
customer_reviews.author: Victor I.

customer_reviews.title: Bad for Ankle, Terrible for Wrists
customer_reviews.text: Bad as ankle weights, terrible as wrist weights. The tightest these can go on a normal sized ankle would fall over your entire foot. The tightest setting fits snug around my calf and I have decently sized calves. Completely useless as wrist weights unless your wrist is the size of a calf because the rosters setting won’t even stay on my forearm and as previously mentioned it worked on my calf so as you can imagine I’m sure how useless they’d be as wrist weights
customer_reviews.author: Honey Pat

customer_reviews.title: Strap cuts ankle
customer_reviews.text: Wear long pants and high socks with these things. I’d you have small ankles, the strap side will cut into your ankle and hurt. I’d return them but I already used them so I’m not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very good !
customer_reviews.text: I like them SO MUCH that i bought one in every weight they have ! . Extremely comfortable , long enough to go around my ankles so that the weight is distributed evenly all around , the grip of the strap is great, never slipped once and i don’t see them ever slipping , flexible and i can work out with them just fine . If you are considering ankle weights , look no further , you will be pleased. I bought others, way more expensive that were very uncomfortable before i bought these . These are just perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: C. Milu

customer_reviews.title: Great weight but California Pro 65 is not my preference
customer_reviews.text: It would of help if the seller will explain the product description In detail. The ankle weights do come with a warning ⚠️ sticker of California Proposition 65. Due to this warning I will return this product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The Best I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect - I'm genuinely happy to find them! The wrist weight bands I've had in the past fit my wrists but not my ankles. These adjust enough to fit both. With other brands I've bought, the Velcro fastener wasn't very secure and wore out quickly. Sometimes weights would go flying off my wrist and across the room with no warning, which is unacceptable. These have an ultra long mega-length of Velcro to keep the wristbands in place and the loop it passes through is a helpful design feature that other brands lack. At $13.99 (price at time of review) these Da Vinci weights are less expensive than other bargain brands, but the quality is far superior. <3
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Zee

customer_reviews.title: Love the weight, wish they were a bit smaller for wrists
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good one. It's easy to use. I bought these for wrist wear, and they are huge so I have to hold them with my hands to keep them from falling off. If they had a bit more adjusting room, it would be great. I have small hands and wrists so they'll be perfect for many folks. All in all I'm pleased and I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fit my small frame nicely
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned if the weights would fit properly.. I have small ankles and wrist and the weights adjusted great. The weights are comfortable, the don't cut into me when I use them. The ones I chose are a pretty mint green color. I received the weights within three days of placing the order.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Verified exactly 1lb each
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these look and feel very high quality, but I also verified that each weight is exactly 1lb. I know that might sound crazy to some, but I can't tell you how many times I've tested a 45lb plate only to find out that it's actually only 43lbs, etc... The fact that these weight exactly 1lb each is commendable, and is the main reason I came back to review the product. If you buy this you will get exactly what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but won’t last long breaking
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these every single day there extremely comfortable and I never notice them but I don’t like the straps they feel weak and sometimes I have to make sure there not to lose or tight as they hurt the bone of the ankle. Must use long socks or else ur skin would rug burn aside from that the material feels sturdy but after a week it has a tiny hole of every day use so I don’t see these lasting for to long
customer_reviews.author: Inucha

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable than the ankle weights I replaced! Use these for my beachbody workout. I tried to use them just wearing around the house for the day as additional exercise and man did it hurt! I have since only worn them for a couple of hours at a time and feel my calves getting stronger. You need to build up to wearing them around for the whole day, and also a great supplement to any workout.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny TinkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sturdy ankle weights!
customer_reviews.text: It was time to move up from my 1.5 pound ankle weights and these seemed the next logical step. I am so glad I bought Da Vinci! Here's what I really like about them: 1. no scratchy areas anywhere 2. thick Velcro strap which fastens securely all around the weight 3. soft, comfortable fabric 4. easy to get on and off The only thing I don't care for is the colour of the three-pound weights - a sort of sickly yellow-green - but that's just aesthetics and I am wincing even as I mention it. In short, they are great little weights which look likely to last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Good Brother Cadfael

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My set, after a full inspection was pristine, albeit daunting at first from the size, however once worn and tightened, I was quite impresssed as to their comfort when affixed just above my ankles. And I wore them for a cardio heavy intensive walk/hike; once my heart got going, I couldn’t even tell that I was wearing them. Wish they came in heavier sets, or perhaps I just need to get a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can't even give this product any stars. There was a warning label on the box that said chemicals in this product may cause cancer and birth defects. The product smelled like turpentine. Made in China. But it back in the box and send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT wrist weights...
customer_reviews.text: These are definitively NOT wrist weights. At least not for normal people. I bought these for a teenage daughter that needed wrist weight for high school dance team. While the weight of each was what we wanted, there was no way they would stay on my daughter's wrist. I then tried them myself thinking I could use them on walks, etc... for my wrists. However, they slid off my wrists as well. Due to this I ended up returning because I had no need for ankle weights.
customer_reviews.author: Aggiebeach

customer_reviews.title: Strap is very irritating to my skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this as ankle weights, and while the weight itself is smooth and comfortable, the velcro strap is not. It digs into my heel, causing lots of irritation. No matter how I move the weight around, it will still irritate whatever area the velcro strap hits. I also tried to use this as wrist weights, but my wrists and hands are too small. Even at its tightest, the weights slip off my wrists. I'll keep these around and use when I'm wearing longer socks but still disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy D.

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as described
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for short period, less than four months, the material has worn through in spots that rub my gym shoes and sprung leaks!!! All the fine granular weight is constantly coming out. I use them while walking on a daily basis and I don't think they are designed for that. I am disappointed and have ordered another set from a different manufacturer, I'll see how durable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Gene A Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I gave these ankle weights 4 stars because of my concern for the straps. After heavy use I want to upgrade them to 5 stars. The straps show no signs of wear. Great product...highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Just get em,!
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous and the added weight to my toe touch crunches and banded glute exercises are a plus, I own bigger and heavier 10pbs black weights but needed something lighter for other exercises, if you’re in the fence of getting these.. get them! Edit- why can’t I add a photo? Wanted to show how gorgeous the red ones are :\
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Fatal Flaw, annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: These are so close to really good but not really usable because of how loosely the sand is packed. The material is nice, the velcro strong, fit is good. But unlike my other pair which is very tightly packed, this is loosely packed and the sand (or whatever it is) pools on one side and makes it unbalanced and uncomfortable. I find them extremely distracting to wear while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice color and quality but way too big for my wrists
customer_reviews.author: sheri b

customer_reviews.title: Da Vinci Adjustable ankle weights
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a right knee replacement Surgery a few months ago. She uses the weights to give resistance when she’s exercising her right knee. She claims it helps her right Knee and it’s good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: obetsr51

customer_reviews.title: The weights are easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: The weights are easy to put on, fit snuggly, stay in place, and feel good. This is my second set, and I put them both on together to get 4 lbs. per leg. I use them in floor exercises to help with a lower back pain problem. It seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The weight is good. They are filled with sand or something similar. However, they are bulky, and the strap does stab into the ankle. I'm thinking of using them around my arms instead. The worse part about this is the hazardous smell! It does make you feel sick. I have to keep them in my garage because it will stench up the house and even my car. I'm not entirely happy with them. But as long as i workout w/ them when i'm outside they'll get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: F. G.

customer_reviews.title: Dependable wrist weights
customer_reviews.text: Post shoulder surgery, I have used these every day for the past 7 months. I have the four pound ones. They are much better than using a hand weight which I tried, but they bothered my wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: They seem to fit comfortable fine, they are a little lose for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought these because my feet were swelling up for some reason, and exercise seems to help allot, I don't have a lot of room to exercise in my room, so I need to increase the weight on the exercises that I am able to do, so I got these. They seem to fit comfortable fine, they are a little lose for my tiny ankles, but it looks like it can tighten up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These leg weights are perfect. They are extremely well made and the fabric is soft but sturdy. The weight is evenly distributed throughout so there is no shifting. Excellent quality and a terrific price.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Marakas

customer_reviews.title: Either these are huge or I have tiny ankles
customer_reviews.text: I doubt my ankles are tiny; they're about 9" and I can cinch these so that the sides meet and they're still a bit loose. They're soft enough, however, that they don't hurt my feet as other weights have done when they scoot down. I wear these as I go about my daily routine, not for any strenuous workout - the looseness might be annoying for that so if your ankles are on the small side, keep that in mind. They are very comfortable, though. Didn't really notice them after the first 15 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Plant Lady

customer_reviews.text: Ankle weights are super easy to use and aesthetically pleasing, they are however very uncomfortable, got a terrible blister in the back of my heels after wearing the ankle weights on a walk. Not quite sure if maybe it was defective or if it always sits that way on ankles? Or perhaps not the correct weight? Could not wear again
customer_reviews.author: Victor Servin

customer_reviews.title: Not for wrist. Ankle is fine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not for wrist even though it says it is. It’ll easily come off, especially if you’re petite. I wanted to use for punching/shadow boxing for my arms. The bags just comes off.
customer_reviews.author: pikachoose

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised that the actual product was described as ankle weights with no mention of wrist use although they can be easily
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I was surprised that the actual product was described as ankle weights with no mention of wrist use although they can be easily worn on the wrists. They appear to be made well and are sturdy. They are extremely comfortable and easy to put on and take off. The only reason I did not give this product 5 stars was because they had a strong, unusual chemical smell. I'm hoping the smell will eventually dissipate but for the time being I am enjoying and hopefully benefitting from their use.
customer_reviews.author: Mar from A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Strong Chemical Odor Plus Warning
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a very strong chemical odor. Sticker on box had California Proposition 35 warning that product contains chemical known to cause cancer, birth defects or other reproductive harm.
customer_reviews.author: Toerrishuman

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, better than expected. I liked the large size range ability due to Velcro closure. I wear them on my ankles as well as above my knees for different exercises
customer_reviews.author: Janie Appleseed

customer_reviews.title: Strong Velcro and fits multiple size wrists
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these weights! I use them every morning, first around my ankles while I do leg stretches and then on my wrists as I do my arm weights. They fit well with strong Velcro, I have small wrists and there's a lot of Velcro left once I close it so I imagine they'd be good for people with medium to large wrists. Comfortable feel and they don't loosen up while using.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Last Ankle Weights You’ll Ever Buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off. I love the long straps. I like to wear these for exercising as well as wearing them during the day when I am doing things around the house, it helps strengthen my legs without even trying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy strengthening
customer_reviews.text: I wear these on walks with my dog. I think it's an easy way to add a little strengthening while I'm doing my normal every day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Latanya Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable weight for ankles
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Da Vinci weights for rehab from a total knee replacement. They are well made, easy to use, and the velcro is very tight. There is one improvement that I would recommend and that is to print the pound size on the item. It is easy to forget what the pound size is when you have more than one and I ordered three different sizes with this order. I wrote in permanent black marker on the item. That is the only reason for the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maribus

customer_reviews.title: Nice while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear at work (I walk a lot at work) and after a month and a half, a hole wore through both pieces of fabric and the lead beads went everywhere. 😭
customer_reviews.author: Raie H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These fit on my teenage daughter's ankles well. She uses them in gymnastics for training. They stay on securely and are comfortable. We got the 1.15 pound (each) weights, blue.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: They Don't Stay Connected to Your Movement
customer_reviews.text: The ankle weights serve their purpose. The outer covering is soft and they are comfortable to wear. The one thing I do not like is that the material stretches. When you move the weight and stop the weight will continue a small movement before stopping. This is because of the stretch in the material so that when your foot stops the weight stretches the material. This makes a weird sensation of the weights still moving. I think the weight material is made of small beads of metal. It doesn't bother me but if you want the weight to feel connected to your movement it might bother you as you do exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Fuji

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Attach Securely
customer_reviews.text: I use these while performing my abdominal exercises. They fit my ankles well (comfortable) and the Velcro is long enough to keep them very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Update: Nice, but develops awful odor
customer_reviews.text: These smell awful after using for only a couple months. Tried spraying with disinfectant spray and even the enzyme spray used for pet accidents but didn’t work. These are otherwise very nice but need antibacterial coating.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable, but the smell is horrible and gave me a very bad headache as soon as I opened the box. I should have read the negative reviews instead of reading only the positive ones and clicking the 1-click button.
customer_reviews.author: WJG

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin ankles and this fit really well. I turn them backwards so the buckle thing doesn't rub on my ankle and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: pame

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these ankle weights, they fit! Last pair I had swirled and sagged on my ankles and these stay in place. The weight is ideal as well, not too heavy to make wearing them unbearable, but heavy enough to feel a good workout with leg lifts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but run a little large.
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my ankles for walking and aerobics. On their tightest setting, they’re still a little large and slide around on my ankles. Other than that, they’re very effective!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with exercises to heal a hip. They are too much weight if I don't use them consistently but they helped a lot. I use them regularly. They are easy to use, attach around your ankle easily.
customer_reviews.author: TLK-KC

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 pounders and although they are of very nice quality, they are too heavy for the strap. Needs a thicker/sturdier strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think you will enjoy this type
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these 3 lb (each), ankle weight for our 14 yr old granddaughter. She is on her High School dance team and they run 2 miles before every practice. She loves the way they fit and they do not slide on the ankles. It was very hard to find 3 lb ankle weights, locally. We purchased 2 1/2 lbs. (Not the required weight) and 5 lbs (where you remove the weight not needed) leaving the weight lopsided and very uncomfortable. I think you will enjoy this type.
customer_reviews.author: SR.

customer_reviews.title: Ok if its going to be a wrist weight, ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok if its going to be a wrist weight, it should be small enough to fit around a wrist, not just a leg weight with extra velcro hoping it will be tight enough....
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbrit

customer_reviews.title: Terrific cost-effective set
customer_reviews.text: I got these easy-to-use and well-priced weights to augment my Pilates workouts. They are versatile and surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: They are ok and do their job
customer_reviews.text: The weights are adjustable for the ankles, but will not fit really thin wrists or ankles, as I already have an issue with that, and my ankle are not that thin. I also have to say that - after wearing them two times now and all in all about an hour, they feel uncomfortable and I am sure, if I start to sweat, it will give me sores or blisters. But then, I might have quite sensitive skin... and might have to adjust to the weights...
customer_reviews.author: tamy2de

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks later the seams started to come apart and there's sand leaking everywhere. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later & Still brand new
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and currently going through all the reviews I've never done while in quarantine. Happy I bought this (as I am a big advocate of at home workouts before the pandemic). Use these 3-5 times a week, they are comfortable with socks or shoes and they give the extra weight for my leg workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Poi

customer_reviews.title: straps overlap and catch on crap but they're heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really thought I'd use these more lol. Well made, straps overlap and catch on crap but they're heavy. And you'll walk funny after you take them off, if you wear it long enough. Pro tip. Don't run with them if you're new. And for god sake, don't kick anything. More inertia! you'll snap your foot, (wo)man.
customer_reviews.author: JKPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had ankle weights that have lasted for years this is the 1st pair of that barely lasted a year the material wore through in the filling spilled out and was always getting into my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to work out at home with since working from home and I love them! Yeah the strap can get a little uncomfortable if you don’t wear the proper socks or don’t strap them in tight enough. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: I love these soft weights, must better than weights that have metal in them. The velcro is secure and they are very comfortable. I am a physical therapist and these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: K. Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected. 4lbs seems good for an average woman doing yoga etc. I am not sure if they would fit tiny ankles or average sized wrists, but for the typical female ankle they are fine. They have a nice feel and seem to fit comfortably and easily. It's nice that the velcro doesn't stick to the main material. The red colour is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: A good comfortable addition to any workout
customer_reviews.text: A good comfortable addition to any workout, got these for my wife to boost her workout routine results and she loved them, great for when you stop feeling the burn of your typical workout. Also can be worn around the house to burn some extra calories without really noticing
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and packaging.
customer_reviews.text: They came in a plastic bag with no label showing the manufacturers name, nor did it have the weight on it. Very poor packaging. plus I never used them because they were crappy and uncomfortable. I should have returned them but my husband threw the box out. It was a true waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Dolman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom and she loves them! She is able to put them on her ankles or her wrists when working out! They aren’t bulky and are very comfortable! We will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Long straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps are too long and I had to cut them. Other than that, they work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Shiva H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wrist weights
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoporosis, which is helped by weight bearing. I use these on my wrists, both at workouts, and around the house so as to help strengthen my bones. I don't know if the weights are helping to build my bone density or not, but I am certainly gaining a lot of strength from using them!
customer_reviews.author: SharonHultman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but fabric is tearing
customer_reviews.text: Worked great replacing my regular velcro attached ankle weights. They stayed in place and didn't rub. But after the first use, they were filthy and that was just from my 4 mile walking exercise, not even power walking. They can't be washed because of the type of material it is. I purchased them in January and used them 3-5 times per week. It is now August and the fabric is tearing and not even at the seam! Just a random tear on the INSIDE of it and tiny black beads are coming out.
customer_reviews.author: luvinme

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, excellent and balanced non-shifting weights.
customer_reviews.text: These really are beautiful to look at, balanced wth non-shifting weight and easy to attach. I can’t imagine another ankle weight being as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal here!
customer_reviews.text: So far it's just what I wanted. Sturdy, doesn't rub or dance on ankles. I ordered a second pair for my wrists. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Use these for my physical therapy exercises. Grateful for the soft and smooth surface on my skin - no chafing.
customer_reviews.author: 7xNana

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for basic use once a week in your home ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe good for basic use once a week in your home fitness program. Not for everyday use. The weights started leaking sand within the first week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Van der Meer

customer_reviews.title: Wears out very quickly, do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use when I go walking/jogging in my neighborhood- nothing too strenuous. After not even 5 uses, the fabric of these ripped, spilling the insides out rendering them useless. I couldn’t believe how quickly they broke! They shouldn’t have worn out so easily, being wrapped around a sock on my ankles for mild exercise. I would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jones Jr

customer_reviews.title: This is Where Everyone Should Buy Weights,,,,
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! It came on time and in great condition. They were exactly what I was looking for. It's made of a very comfortable and breathable material and after using them for hour I am left with no red or irritable marks on my skin. The Velcro straps are really nice and durable and help keep weights in please. Great Find.
customer_reviews.author: Christa Douglas

customer_reviews.title: prefect weight
customer_reviews.text: perfect weight to walk around the block with and leg lifts on your sofa.
customer_reviews.author: VasiKing

customer_reviews.title: Please save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly, on the box it says “this product contains chemicals known to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm.” In my opinion, save your.money. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and exactly as described. I've had for a few months now and no complaints. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I am making great progress.
customer_reviews.text: I had rota-tar cuff surgery and I am using these as my weights. Holding these in my hands. I am making great progress.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensory issues and I bought these to give her more stability and when she attends therapy. It works for her needs. She is skinny so I have to tie them tighter but I can’t complain for the price
customer_reviews.author: Humma

customer_reviews.title: DaVinci 5 lb. Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product. I actually bought them for photography. I put them inside the "sandbags" that are used as weights to hold down tripods/lightstands. I have purchased 3 now for that purpose & they work like a charm. Much better than messy sand or water bottles that weren't fitting/molding very well. These mold to the shape of my sandbags.
customer_reviews.author: joanlizard

customer_reviews.title: It stinks - but it works
customer_reviews.text: This is a five-star product except for one very large issue. Upon opening the package, I was assaulted by one of the foulest chemical odors I've ever encountered. The smell was akin to burning rubber and overpowering in intensity. I honestly believed the odor to be hazardous and immediately took the product outside. After a week of sitting outside, the odor had diminished to the point that the product was usable. And, it works quite well. It's well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JackHughs

customer_reviews.title: Loving these weights!!
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect weight and have intensified my workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Khi.

customer_reviews.title: leg exercise
customer_reviews.text: good for leg lifts both backward and frontward and knee lifts
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I’m a small woman and these are way too bulky for me. Got dumb bells instead
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I really am enjoying these. They fit well and I'm quite happy to say that they aren't too heavy or too light for me. The color is actually very lovely to look at as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Convenient to use
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot. Only caution is to be careful that the Velcro strap doesn’t catch on and damage the material that covers the weight. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alan A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Materials are of good quality. It fits well but a little uncomfortable where the velcro strap is.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Mara

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Work well But are a little big for wrist weights but I hold onto them to use with my wrists the material seems fine and they are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Carola

customer_reviews.title: I love these. Great for wearing on the treadmill when ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great for wearing on the treadmill when working out. They are a very bright color so thats one thing to think about before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great to have
customer_reviews.text: Love them but I think I could have got 3-5 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sewing diva

customer_reviews.title: Just to heavy for me
customer_reviews.text: Being 88 years old ,They are just to heavy for me to handle. Please send me a return label so I can send them back to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE, PRICED JUST RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and helpful for my husband's physical therapy after bilateral hip surgery. Thank you for a quality product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first set of ankle weights and I wear these to train daily for toning and resistance work. Really recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric and stay on
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to add to my exercise and really like them because they are soft and stay on
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great weights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them when I was recovering from knee surgery. They really helped strengthen my thigh muscles. I use them even more now that I'm not in pain from the surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: They are of very nice quality. The reason for 3 stars was that the Velcro was too long once on my ankles, would not wear them on my wrists for that reason. And metal piece that Velcro attaches around starts to dig into my ankles after some time of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ankle Weights
customer_reviews.text: Product is comfortable, easy to adjust and wear and is sturdy. I am currently in Physical Therapy treatment and use the weights for the exercises that I do at home. I bought these weights because they are like one pound weights that I bought in a local store. I am very satisfied with both.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: I never would have wasted money on these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these about 18 months ago. They are the newest set of ankle weights I have, and they are the FIRST set to develop holes and need to be replaced. I've owned my oldest Thera-Bands for over 3 years and never needed to replace them. If Thera had 5 pound weights, I never would have wasted money on these. Long and short: they do the job but for a limited time. I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: domynoe

customer_reviews.title: Soft !
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice feeling. Nothing digs in or bothers me to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: dezirea

customer_reviews.title: DaVinci 2 lb. adjustable ankle weights.
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this product very much. Easy to put on and take off, as well. My only problem is that they are just a bit too big for my ankles, so they tend to ride up and down a bit depending on the exercises I'm doing. Not a big deal, but I can't seem to find any that are smaller in size.
customer_reviews.author: Eco-Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I love what this has done for my legs
customer_reviews.text: I love what this has done for my legs! I'm definitely not a gym person, so I wear these when I go bike riding to build even faster. Biking 20 miles everyday with these on is great! Fast shipping, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy T.

customer_reviews.title: My gymnast loves these
customer_reviews.text: These are used by my 7 year old gymnasts for workouts. They fit great and are comfortable to wear!! She even attaches them to her waist (putting two together) when climbing the ropes
customer_reviews.author: Mommy MacGyver

product_meta.title: DA VINCI Adjustable Ankle Weights Sold in Pairs of 1 to 5 lbs (2 to 10 lbs per Set)
feature_bullets: Adjustable velcro bands to easily fit ankles of any size for a comfortable fit
